btClient

Class CommunicationTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • btClient.CommunicationTracker

  • public class CommunicationTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is tasked with handling communications with the torrent tracker, such as establishing a connection, finding peers, and alerting the tracker to the current state of the download

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Common behavior is for a downloader to try to listen on port 6881 and if that port is taken try 6882, then 6883, etc. and give up after 6889.
        Returns:
        a valid port.
